Name: song you wish you had lost your virginity to
Description: Bonus points if you comment with the song you actually lost your virginity to

Name: Help Guy Ritchie pick the song for the opening credits of his next British gangster movie
pitch a theme for a round in the comments, and then submit a song that nails the theme (redux)
Description: points awarded partly for how good the round idea is, and partly for the usual reasons (good song, good fit).

Name: Pitch a new TV game show & submit the theme song
If You're Hearing This Song Then Something Is Wrong
Description:
Submit a song that signals to those that know you that something is terribly wrong. 

At a horrific first date and need rescuing? 
Clogged the toilet at a party and need to leave ASAP? Been kidnapped? 
Requesting this song should immediately signify you are in danger / need help.

Good songs only. Not obvious songs.

Name: Don't touch that dial!
Description:
Submit the song that if you skip, your partner will treat it as grounds for divorce (other relationships accepted)

Good songs only (doesn't mean you have to like song, just no objectively bad songs)

Name: Best song for driving in the rain and you’re sad but you don’t want the song to make you sadder
Description:
Good songs only.
No obvious songs.
And no Paul Simon because we already did that.

Name: Hidden gems from the 1990’s (max. 25k monthly listeners)
Description: Max. 25k monthly listeners. Good songs only.

Name: A song you did a complete 180 on
You probably haven't heard of them
Description: Artist must be under 2,219 monthly listeners.
